name: io.github.ChronulusAI/chronulus-mcp
description: Chronulus MCP provides access to the Chronulus AI platform of forecasting and prediction agents.

tools.name: create_chronulus_session
tools.description: A tool that creates a new Chronulus Session and returns a session_id

tools.name: create_forecasting_agent_and_get_forecast
tools.description: This tool creates a NormalizedForecaster agent with your session and input data model and then provides a forecast input data to the agent and returns the prediction data and text explanation from the agent.

tools.name: reuse_forecasting_agent_and_get_forecast
tools.description: This tool provides a forecast input to a previous created Chronulus NormalizedForecaster agent and returns the prediction data and text explanation from the agent.

tools.name: rescale_forecast
tools.description: A tool that rescales the prediction data (values between 0 and 1) from the NormalizedForecaster agent to scale required for a use case

tools.name: save_forecast
tools.description: A tool that saves a Chronulus forecast from NormalizedForecaster to separate CSV and TXT files

tools.name: create_prediction_agent_and_get_predictions
tools.description: This tool creates a BinaryPredictor agent with your session and input data model and then provides prediction input data to the agent and returns the consensus a prediction from a panel of experts along with their individual estimates and text explanations.

tools.name: reuse_prediction_agent_and_get_prediction
tools.description: This tool provides prediction input data to a previously created Chronulus BinaryPredictor agent and returns the consensus a prediction from a panel of experts along with their individual estimates and text explanations.

tools.name: save_prediction_analysis_html
tools.description: A tool that saves an analysis of a BinaryPredictor prediction to HTML.

tools.name: get_risk_assessment_scorecard
tools.description: A tool that retrieves the risk assessment scorecard for the Chronulus Session in Markdown format
